content:
I've got Localization Update sort of working. https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/l10n_update I worked on it for a client but I'm only half-motivated to have it all working since currently Backdrop-specific translations are only available for core. Anyone else interested in testing and figuring out how to get it fully working. @indigoxela @Olaf Grabienski

backdrop-contrib/l10n_update
Helps to keep the translation of your Backdrop core and contributed modules up to date with automatic updates. - backdrop-contrib/l10n_update

One issue seems to be the version numbers. l10n_update assumes a core of 1.x but the actual files on localize.backdrocms.org have it as 1.17 etc. And it is also inconsistent in the versions: 1.17 versus 1.13.0.

@Herb Re version numbers, they were changed at a certain point by @jenlampton , see https://github.com/backdrop-ops/localize.backdropcms.org/issues/27#issuecomment-497838789 and below.

Add core releases and source files · Issue #27 · backdrop-ops/localize.backdropcms.org
The translation server needs a new language source file for every Backdrop release, and we have to make a translation release of it. We're planning to generate the language files automatically....

currently Backdrop-specific translations are only available for core

We could provide other projects as well. Care to open an issue in the localize queue? I‘m not at the computer atm.

@Herb https://github.com/backdrop-ops/localize.backdropcms.org/issues/41

Provide translations for contrib projects · Issue #41 · backdrop-ops/localize.backdropcms.org
Currently Backdrop-specific translations are only available for core. Let's also provide translations for modules and other contrib projects.
